query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(periodstartdate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS filings_count, filingtype, periodyear, filing WHERE periodstartdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, filingtype, periodyear, filing ORDER BY month, filingtype, periodyear

periodstartdate.description: Report period start date in date format

filingtype.description: Indicates if the filing is an original filing or an amendment.

filing.description: URL to download a PDF copy of the filing.

table_metadata.title: SFEC Form 3410B - Quarterly Report for Permit Consultants Filings
table_metadata.description: An individual who qualifies as a permit consultant under San Francisco law must register and file quarterly reports with the Ethics Commission.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: economic researchers, policy makers, compliance departments

whom_it_may_interest: economic researchers, policy makers, compliance departments
